title: Trump Immigration Order Awaits Circuit Court Decision (Audio)
itunes:title: Trump Immigration Order Awaits Circuit Court Decision (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- David Rivkin, a partner at Baker Hostetler, and Kari Hong, a professor at Boston College Law School, discuss a forthcoming decision in the legal fight over President Trump's executive order on immigration. They speak with June Grasso and Greg Stohr on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
